text: Burlesque is a 2010 musical movie. It is about a woman losing her waitress job and then moving to Los Angeles. She gets a job dancing in a burlesque show. Cher plays Tess, Christina Aguilera plays Ali and Julianne Hough plays Georgia. The movie was sent to North American theaters just before Thanksgiving 2010. The ratings of the movie were mixed to negative. Its box office performance, however, was close to $90 million. ==Related pages== *Burlesque (soundtrack), the soundtrack from the movie Category:2010s musical movies Category:2010 drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies
title: Burlesque (movie)
